trans-unit.source: Represents a data view on an XML node or collection of XML nodes for an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en datavy på en XML-nod eller en uppsättning XML-noder för en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control can present its underlying data in both tabular and hierarchical format to Web server controls that bind to it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>Kontrollen kan presentera dess underliggande data i både tabular och hierarkiska format till webbserverkontroller som binder till det.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> to bind to XML data and present it in list or tabular form, while controls that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, bind to XML data and present it in hierarchical form.
trans-unit.target: Styr som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>använder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>för att binda till XML-data och finns i listan eller tabellform, medan kontroller som härleds från den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>klassen som <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>, binda till XML-data och finns i hierarkisk form.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> creates each view type internally through different code paths.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>skapar varje visningstyp internt via olika kodsökvägar.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A> method is called on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object is created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>metoden anropas för den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontroll, en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>objektet har skapats av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IDataSource.GetView%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource.GetHierarchicalView%2A> method is called, an XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView object is created.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> class is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and bind to lists and tabular data, while the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView is provided for Web server controls that derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> and bind to hierarchical data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>klass har angetts för webbserverkontroller som härleds från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>och binda till listor och tabelldata, medan XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView har angetts för Web server styr som härleds från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>och binda till hierarkiska data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Internally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> classes call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> object view to retrieve data from a data source, while a class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Internt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>och <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl>klasserna anropet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A>metod för <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView>objekt att hämta data från en datakälla, medan en klass som härletts från <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl>anrop den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeDataBoundControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl>

trans-unit.source: Like all <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView> helper objects, the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView defines the operations that the data source can perform with the underlying data.
trans-unit.target: Som alla <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>helper objekt, XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView definierar de åtgärder som datakällan kan utföra med underliggande data.</xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Because the XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView class only overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> method, the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control does not support sort expressions or execute, delete, or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Eftersom XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView klassen endast åsidosättningar i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>metod, den associerade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>kontrollen stöder inte sorteringsuttryck eller köra, ta bort eller uppdatera operationer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlHierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the data items from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en lista över dataobjekt från den underliggande datakällan.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable> that is returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> is an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and can be used like any <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>som returneras av <xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A>är en <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>och kan användas som något <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>samling.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Web.UI.HierarchicalDataSourceView.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> and iterate through the collection of <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> nodes, or use `foreach` (in C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Anropa den <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>metod för att hämta en <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>och gå igenom mängden <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>noder eller Använd `foreach` (i C#) eller `For Each` (Visual Basic).</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"></xref> collection of data items based on the hierarchical level of the current view.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable"> </xref> uppsättning dataobjekt baserat på den hierarkiska nivån för den aktuella vyn.
